parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the mate entities, false to not; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMatetype_e.swMateDISTANCE

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE

parameters.name: DistanceAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum distance value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE (see Remarks )

parameters.name: DistanceAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum distance value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE (see Remarks )

parameters.name: GearRatioNumerator
parameters.description: Gear ratio numerator value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateGEAR

parameters.name: GearRatioDenominator
parameters.description: Gear ratio denominator value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateGEAR

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateANGLE

parameters.name: AngleAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum angle value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateANGLE

parameters.name: AngleAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum angle value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateANGLE

parameters.name: ForPositioningOnly
parameters.description: True to only position the components according to the mating relationship and not return a mate, false to return a mate

parameters.name: LockRotation
parameters.description: True to lock component rotation, false to not

parameters.name: WidthMateOption
parameters.description: Width mate options as defined in swMateWidthOptions_e ; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateWIDTH

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

title: IAssemblyDoc.AddMate5
signature:

   System.Int32
MateTypeFromEnum
,
   System.Int32
AlignFromEnum
,
   System.Boolean
Flip
,

Distance

   System.Double

,

,

,

ForPositioningOnly

parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the mate entities, false to not; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMatetype_e.swMateDISTANCE

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE

parameters.name: DistanceAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum distance value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE (see Remarks )

parameters.name: DistanceAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum distance value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE (see Remarks )

parameters.name: GearRatioNumerator
parameters.description: Gear ratio numerator value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateGEAR

parameters.name: GearRatioDenominator
parameters.description: Gear ratio denominator value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateGEAR

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateANGLE

parameters.name: AngleAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum angle value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateANGLE

parameters.name: AngleAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum angle value; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateANGLE

parameters.name: ForPositioningOnly
parameters.description: True to only position the components according to the mating relationship and not return a mate, false to return a mate

parameters.name: LockRotation
parameters.description: True to lock component rotation, false to not

parameters.name: WidthMateOption
parameters.description: Width mate options as defined in swMateWidthOptions_e ; valid only if MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateWIDTH

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

remarks:
To create:
Standard, advanced, and mechanical mates, use
IAssemblyDoc::CreateMate
.
Misaligned concentric mates, use
IAssemblyDoc::AddConcentricMateWithTolerance
.
Cylindrical distance mates, use
IAssemblyDoc::AddDistanceMate
.
The difference between this method and the now obsolete IAssemblyDoc::AddMate4 is the WidthMateOption parameter.
To specify a distance mate without limits, set the DistanceAbsUpperLimit and DistanceAbsLowerLimit parameters equal to the Distance parameter.
If MateTypeFromEnum is swMateType_e.swMateDISTANCE or swMateType_e.swMateANGLE, and the mate is applied to the closest position that meets the mate condition specified by Distance or Angle, then setting Flip to true moves the components to the other possible mate position.
To add a standard or mechanical mate:
Call
IModelDoc2::ClearSelection2
before selecting entities to mate.
Call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
to select each entity to mate.
If MateTypeFromEnum is...
Use selection mark...
swMateType_e.swMateCAMFOLLOWER
8
swMateType_e.swMateWIDTH
16
Other swMateType_e option
1
Call this method.
Call IModelDoc2::ClearSelection2 after the mate is created.
If entities are not preselected, then ErrorStatus is swAddMateError_e.swAddMateError_IncorrectSelections, and nothing is returned.
